document_data.caption: A map showing the location of the Asp's Strike (labeled #30) on Waterdeep Way in the Castle Ward.
document_data.name: The Asp's Strike
document_data.mainbody: The ''' Asp's Strike''' was a tavern located in the city of [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: The tavern was located on [[Waterdeep Way]] just south of [[Ahghairon's Tower]] in Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]].
